1111000101110110 1010111100111011 1 -> sum: 1010000010110010, cout: 1

1000101110011001 0011000010011110 0 -> sum: 1011110000110111, cout: 0
1001001010111100 0000001111000110 1 -> sum: 1001011010000011, cout: 0
0001110001101010 0110110001001000 1 -> sum: 1000100010110011, cout: 0
1010000000111011 0101001110001000 1 -> sum: 1111001111000100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
